restaurants.notables: The most expensive tacos on the menu are $3 and they are some of the best outside of San Diego
Most of the menu is under $15 and it's BYOB
Holy Mole. Yeah I said it. Also that mezcal selection tho

restaurants.sampleitems: Biriyani, but also so many curries.
restaurants.notables: Everything is under $14 while also being delicious at the same time

restaurants.sampleitems: The steak salad with kale is always good plus they have great specials.
restaurants.notables: Usually two salads are under $30 for takeout so it's a good cheap, reliable meal

restaurants.sampleitems: Fish curry and that eggplant dish that tastes even better next day. Plus so many other things we have not even tried.
restaurants.notables: The best Indian food you've had? Maybe.
Also near Big Foot Lodge and Oldfields if you're wanting to go get drinks too
Some of the best tacos you've ever had. Worth the drive just for these
Cheap and tasty, multiple locations based on what you're up to

restaurants.sampleitems: XLB, Cumin Lamb, Fish in Chili Oil, Spicy Wontons
restaurants.notables: So worth the headache of a drive every time and a cheap meal at that
Nothing to note, just go here and you'll get it

A simple, healthy solution for lunch or dinner
Oaxacan food in Mar Vista
This can go from affordable to not really fast with mezcal but it's more than worth it
Halal chicken place on Sepulveda
Every time you go here it's always way cheaper than you thought it was going to be and so good
Overorder and save what's left for bomb leftovers, there's also a Santa Monica location
Well reviewed pho restaurant in Chinatown near cute wine bar
Go eat a taco one

restaurants.sampleitems: Ramen and other great Japanese favorites
restaurants.notables: Great for quick ramen but also the supermarket has amazing Japanese ingredients
You know you want it
Cheap, easy, delicious: no brainer

restaurants.sampleitems: You can get their cafe items or bring some deli items home for a romantic meal
restaurants.notables: Don't go if it's during a stupid time or the chaos will make you want to punch somebody. Honestly it'd still be worth it though

restaurants.sampleitems: Literally one of the only places to get Burmese food
restaurants.notables: Closed on Mondays
Filling, cheap, delicious
Closed Wednesdays, can be anywhere between 25 minutes and 1h30 to get to
Toasted reuben and great wine selection
Open 24 Hours
Cheap and close, closed Saturdays

Open every day from 2-2

restaurants.sampleitems: Pastrami on rye, Matzoh ball soup

restaurants.sampleitems: Mediterranean food with a great patio
restaurants.notables: Closed Mondays, otherwise open 12pm-9pm

An easy Venice option, open every day from 11am until midnight

Open every day from 11am until at least midnight

restaurants.sampleitems: Come for the drinks, stay for the kimchi quesadilla

restaurants.sampleitems: The best vegan restauraunt in Los Angeles (those flautas and buffalo cauliflower omg)

restaurants.sampleitems: Elevated pub grub and killer beer selection

restaurants.sampleitems: Very legitimate Mexican restaurant in Santa Monica
restaurants.notables: Open every day from 8am-1pm

restaurants.sampleitems: Pizza and Pasta in sleepy Ocean Park neighborhood
restaurants.notables: Open every day, a chill & easy option

restaurants.sampleitems: The best damn raw bar and seafood market you're gonna find in LA County
restaurants.notables: I'm jealous that you are going here. Please take me with you

restaurants.sampleitems: Pasta and wine: You cannot go wrong
restaurants.notables: Ideal date spot near the Aero Theatre on Montana Ave

restaurants.sampleitems: Delicious pasta that you can and should get with a giant ball of burrata
restaurants.notables: They only do carbonara on Sunday

restaurants.sampleitems: The burger is well-known and splittable, but you're here for the beer
restaurants.notables: Only open for lunch on weekends, there's also a much smaller location on Montana Ave in Santa Monica (OG)

restaurants.sampleitems: Sooo this is definitely a wine bar, BUT they often have amazing food pop ups, and if they don't you're in Thai Town so good food is within reach

restaurants.sampleitems: Their mac n cheese is ideal, but so are their other tasty snackies

restaurants.sampleitems: Best mediterranean restaurant in Los Angeles
